ImportClusterButton.Title: Import a new cluster
ImportClusterButton.Body: Bring a new cluster to the ecosystem and instantly eliminate all administration overhead in less than 15 minutes.

ImportClustterForm.Description: Description must have at least 1 character
ImportClustterForm.Host: Host must have at least 1 character
ImportClustterForm.Name: Name must have at least 1 character
ImportClustterForm.Password: Password must have at least 8 characters
ImportClustterForm.Port: Port must be a positive integer
ImportClustterForm.User: User must have at least 1 character

UsersPage.TopDescription: Configure e manage all aspects related to access of your cluster
UsersPage.TrackedUsersDescription: Users who are registered with ostern. There may be users registered in the rabbit cluster that do not appear in this list.

QueuesPage.TopDescription: Configure e manage all aspects related to queues of your cluster

ExchangePage.TopDescription: Configure e manage all aspects related to exchanges of your cluster

SettingsPage.TopDescription: Managament of cluster config on orabbit platform

Type.Label: Type
Type.Description: Choose between a queue of type Quorum or Type

Queue.Label: Name
Queue.Placeholder: Provide a nome for the queue

[BROKER_ALREADY_EXISTS]: This cluster already exists in database, maybe there was disabled. You can enable the cluster in the graviardy page
[QUEUE_NOTFOUND_INCLUSTER]: The name of the queue cound'nt not be found on rabbitmq cluster

VirtualHostsPage.TopDescription: Isolate, secure, and manage independent messaging environments within a single broker

label-block-item: By blocking this item, all changes will be disabled. This will prevent unauthorized changes from being made until the item is unlocked.
label-reason-explain: Explain the reason for blocking this item
